This plot shows the effect of increasing the intergenic distance threshold (--gap argument in cblaster) on both the total amount of predicted clusters, as well as the mean and median cluster size (bp).

If you found cblaster useful, please cite:

						Gilchrist, C.L.M, 2020. cblaster: a Python toolkit for detecting co-located BLAST hits.
